Коротко о компании: During its activity for more than 10 years "MEGAMIX" has accumulated the richest experience in the field of production of construction and finishing materials, and today the list of assortment has reached more than 40 names of finished products. These are not only standard dry building mixes, such as putty or plaster, but also adhesives for ceramic, granite, mosaic, etc. tiles, masonry mortar, poured flooring, waterproofing materials, decorative facade coatings, special primers, water-based paints, wallpaper adhesives and others.
Компания \"Megamix\" укомплектовала свое: The company "Megamix" has equipped numerous facilities with its advanced products: sports complexes, skyscrapers, mosques, hotels, restaurants, business centers, shopping centers, residential complexes.
Узбекистан - государство с многовековой: Uzbekistan is a state with a long history going back thousands of years. The territory of modern Uzbekistan is located in the very center of Central Asia between the two rivers Syr Darya and Amu Darya.
Узбекистан сегодня - демократическое гос: Uzbekistan today is a democratic state, an open and fair society that cares about every citizen and is based on the principles of friendship and cooperation with the international community
